contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox protected area | name = Dalby Söderskog National Park | alt_name = | iucn_category = II | photo = Dalby Söderskog nationalpark1.jpg | photo_width = 288 | photo_caption = | location = [[Skåne County]], [[Sweden]] | nearest_city = [[Lund]] | coords = {{coord|55|40|N|13|19|E|region:SE_type:landmark|display=inline,title}} | area = {{convert|0.36|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}}<ref name="naturvårdsverket">{{cite web | title=Dalby Söderskog National Park | url=http://www.naturvardsverket.se/en/In-English/Start/Enjoying-nature/National-parks-and-other-places-worth-visiting/National-Parks-in-Sweden/Dalby-Soderskog-National-Park/ | publisher=[[Environmental Protection Agency (Sweden)|Naturvårdsverket]] | accessdate=2009-02-26}}</ref> | established = 1918<ref name="naturvårdsverket" /> | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | governing_body = [[Environmental Protection Agency (Sweden)|Naturvårdsverket]] | website = }} [[Image:National parks of Sweden numbers.png|thumb|140px|left|Dalby Söderskog is number 26 on the map]] '''Dalby Söderskog''' is a small [[national park]] in the province of [[Skåne|Scania]] in southern [[Sweden]], situated in the [[Lund Municipality|municipality of Lund]], near [[Dalby, Lund|Dalby]]. It has an area of 0.36 km² and consists of broadleaf forest. It was established in 1918, when it was thought to be a unique remnant of primeval forest. In fact, the area has previously been used for [[pasture]]. The ground contains much [[limestone]] and [[chalk]], which makes the flora rich. In particular, there are many spring flowers. An earth bank of unknown origin, possibly the ruins of an ancient fort, surrounds parts of the park. The national park encompasses the southern part of [[Dalby Hage]], while the northern parts ([[Dalby Norreskog]] and [[Hästhagen]]) form a nature reserve. {{clear}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons|Dalby Söderskog}} * [http://www.naturvardsverket.se/en/In-English/Start/Enjoying-nature/National-parks-and-other-places-worth-visiting/National-Parks-in-Sweden/Dalby-Soderskog-National-Park/ Dalby Söderskog National Park] from the [[Swedish Environmental Protection Agency]] {{National parks of Sweden}} [[Category:National parks of Sweden]] [[Category:Scania]] [[Category:Protected areas established in 1918]] [[Category:1918 establishments in Sweden]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in Skåne County]] [[Category:Geography of Skåne County]] {{Protected-area-stub}}
